tr.td: Mount Ida wins toss, defers to second half
Tyler Rodgers kickoff 55 yards to the BCFB10, DeJahn Dawkins return 19 yards to the BCFB29 (Matt Martin).
John Creesy rush for 1 yard to the BCFB30 (Sean Chinova;Mamour Samb).

Dylan McGuire pass incomplete to Cruz Desrochers.
